#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<malloc.h>
#define lld long long int
#define llu long long unsigned int
int compare(const void * a, const void * b){return *(lld *)a-*(lld *)b;}
#define min(a,b)(a>b?b:a)
#define max(a,b)(a<b?b:a)
#define sort(arr,n) qsort(arr,n,sizeof(arr[0]),compare)
#define sd(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define su(n) scanf("%llu",&n)
#define pdn(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define pln(n) printf("%lld\n",n)
#define pun(n) printf("%llu\n",n)
#define pd(n) printf("%d",n)
#define pl(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define pu(n) printf("%llu",n)
#define pn printf("\n")
#define ps printf(" ")
#define rep(i,start,end) for(i=start; i<end; i++)
int main()
{
    long long unsigned int test,len,i;
    su(test);
    while(test--)
    {
        char list[100001];
        scanf("%s",list);
        len=strlen(list);
        int count=0;
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(list[i]=='T')
                 count++;
            else count--;
            if(count<0)
                break;
        }
        if(count==0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
